Destroy an enemy follower.
Enhance (8): Then put a Servant of Darkness into your hand.
Call of Cocytus.baseFlair: This power freezes teardrops and screams alike.

Divine Retribution.name: Divine Retribution
Divine Retribution.baseEffect:
Randomly destroy an enemy follower with the highest attack in play.
Enhance (8): Then deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.
Divine Retribution.baseFlair: Penance can wait. It's time to scream.

Slash of the One.name: Slash of the One
Slash of the One.baseEffect:
Whenever an allied follower evolves, if only 1 allied follower is in play, change the cost of this card to 3.
----------
Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.
Slash of the One.baseFlair:
You are your own god.
Solitude is proof of power.

Heaven's Gate.name: Heaven's Gate
Heaven's Gate.baseEffect:
Invocation: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 5 play points and an allied Heaven's Gate is not in play, invoke this card.
Until this amulet leaves play, both leaders have the following effect: At the start of your turn, subtract 3 from the cost of a random card in your hand. If there are no duplicate cards in your deck, subtract 10 instead.
Heaven's Gate.baseFlair:
"I've gone through this gate so many times, it doesn't even phase me anymore." —Lyrial, Celestial Archer
"Why exactly have you been going back and forth so much?" —Ephemera, Angelic Slacker

Raging Ettin.name: Raging Ettin
Raging Ettin.baseFlair: The twin-headed giant runs rampant under the moonlit sky. Blades shatter against its steel-like hide, and arrows bounce harmlessly into the dirt.
Raging Ettin.evoFlair: Clad in armor of steel, the twin-headed giant stalks the night. Its blood-stained armor gleams with a dark promise beneath the moon.

Mr. Full Moon.name: Mr. Full Moon
Mr. Full Moon.baseEffect: Fanfare: Randomly change the attack of an enemy follower with the highest attack in play to 1.
Mr. Full Moon.baseFlair: How's my comely countenance? So exquisite you can't peel your eyes away, right? But don't be so surprised. Just wait—soon I'll be waxed to the max! Om-nom-nom...
Mr. Full Moon.evoFlair: My face is the full moon! What do you think? So perfect you're getting weak in the knees, right? H-huh? All the green cheese has made me put on weight, you say? W-well... You're exactly right!

Sgathaich.name: Sgathaich
Sgathaich.baseEffect:
Accelerate (3): Give +2/+2 to an allied follower.
----------
Fanfare: Give +2/+2 to another allied follower.
Sgathaich.baseFlair: Hound of Culann, heaven's chosen warrior, unto you shall I bequeath my all-piercing spear, my runic magic—all I know of battle.
Sgathaich.evoFlair: The gods have high hopes for you, Hound. Therefore be guided by me in the arts of war. Hone your blade for the fated battle to come!

Lion Champion.name: Lion Champion
Lion Champion.baseEffect:
Ward.
Whenever this follower is attacked, gain +1/+1.
Lion Champion.evoEffect:
Ward.
Whenever this follower is attacked, gain +1/+1.
Lion Champion.baseFlair: Enter our territory if you will. But we'll provide no quarter for plunderers. Away, fangless one!
Lion Champion.evoFlair: Beastfolk we are, but monsters we're not. We don't swipe our claws haphazardly. So I'm chopping you in two with this mighty axe.

Katalina, Sky Guardian.name: Katalina, Sky Guardian
Katalina, Sky Guardian.baseEffect:
Ward.
Can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
Katalina, Sky Guardian.baseFlair: The day I freed Lyria... That's when I vowed to protect her with everything I have.
Katalina, Sky Guardian.evoFlair: It was a mistake to ally myself with the empire... You can throw whatever you like at me, but I won't let you lay a finger on Lyria!

Catherine, Epicurean Angel.name: Catherine, Epicurean Angel
Catherine, Epicurean Angel.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Restore 6 defense to your leader.
Fanfare: Enhance (10) - Restore 10 defense instead.
Catherine, Epicurean Angel.baseFlair: I'm absolutely terrible at cooking, but I understand wanting to prepare a delicious meal for someone you care about. I would be more than happy to use my heavenly palate to assist you with your own cooking! Now then, let's have a taste... Oooh momma!
Catherine, Epicurean Angel.evoFlair: This... This dish! What a delicate and gentle flavor! It's not perfect, but I can sense the love that went into its preparation—simply delightful. Hehe... It makes me want to head to the kitchen right now!

Angel Crusher.name: Angel Crusher
Angel Crusher.baseEffect: Fanfare: Discard your hand, and gain +1/+1 for each discarded card.
Angel Crusher.baseFlair: Yes, let me bathe in your screams of agony and despair. I am coming for you all, angels, and I will pluck every snow-white feather from your wings.
Angel Crusher.evoFlair: Are you not honored, angels, to become prey for such a noble being as I? Go on now. Cry your last tears as you sink into hell.

Athena.name: Athena
Athena.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give all other allied followers the following effect until the end of the turn - Reduce damage to 0.
Athena.baseFlair: Come, brave warrior. My shield shall protect you from harm and shall ward off the specter of defeat. I shall give you the ability to overcome endless conflict!
Athena.evoFlair: My wisdom promises blessings greater than those of divine providence or earthly destiny! Come, you have been chosen! Fight alongside me against the forces of evil! The light of victory is set to shine upon you!

Suttungr.name: Suttungr
Suttungr.baseEffect: Fanfare: Banish an enemy amulet. Gain +3/+3 instead if there are no enemy amulets in play.
Suttungr.baseFlair:
Seeking mead, seeking rivals,
he crisscrosses the earth.
His sanity slips, his heart fills
with rage, floods with hate.
—Poems of Suttungr
Suttungr.evoFlair:
The grinning war god quaffing mead.
Untouchable by men, tortured by memory,
he crosses mountains, treks ranges,
yet the heavenly one remains remote.
—Poems of Suttungr

Urd, Goddess of Restoration.name: Urd, Goddess of Restoration
Urd, Goddess of Restoration.baseEffect: Fanfare: Destroy a follower. If it is an allied follower, randomly summon a copy of an allied follower that has been destroyed during this match. If it is an enemy follower, randomly summon an enemy copy of an enemy follower that has been destroyed during this match.
Urd, Goddess of Restoration.baseFlair: Before those who continue to seek possibility, she reveals herself. Those who refuse to submit to the pain—she shall never abandon them. —The Goddess of Restoration, Chapter 2
Urd, Goddess of Restoration.evoFlair: Before those who hinder possibility, she reveals herself. Those who would usurp freedom—she shall never forgive them. —The Goddess of Restoration, Chapter 3

Mithra, Daybreak Deity.name: Mithra, Daybreak Deity
Mithra, Daybreak Deity.baseEffect: Fanfare: Draw 3 cards. Then randomly discard 2 cards in your hand.
Mithra, Daybreak Deity.evoEffect: Evolve: Return an enemy follower or amulet to your opponent's hand.
Mithra, Daybreak Deity.baseFlair: Sorry to keep you waiting! Now Mithra's here, so have no fear! The time for blessings and protections is near!
Mithra, Daybreak Deity.evoFlair: You know, I'd love to just grant everybody's wishes... but rules are rules! First, I've gotta test you! Don't you worry, though! Mithra has something for all the good little boys and girls who try their best!

Viridia Magna.name: Viridia Magna
Viridia Magna.baseEffect:
Rush.
Bane.
Fanfare: If at least 1 allied Naterran Great Tree has been destroyed this match, gain the ability to attack 2 times per turn. If at least 3 Naterran Great Trees have been destroyed this match, give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, if there are no allied Viridia Magnas in play, summon a Viridia Magna, evolve it, then remove this effect. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Viridia Magna.baseFlair: The aether withers, and nature dies with it—signs that our Mother has abandoned us. We must cast her aside, as all children must eventually cast aside their ancestral hearth. Naterra will be saved by the blade, and by the blade alone. —Valdain, Forest Shadow
Viridia Magna.evoFlair: The aether glitters, and nature is its reflection—signs that our Mother has blessed us. We must treat her with grace, as all children must venerate their progenitors. Naterra will be saved by peace, and by peace alone. —Bayleon, Forest King

Shiva.name: Shiva
Shiva.baseEffect:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your sixth, ninth, and twelfth turns, restore 2 defense to your leader. At the end of your seventh, tenth, and thirteenth turns, give +1/+0 to all allied followers. At the end of your eighth, eleventh, and fourteenth turns, deal 4 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)<<{me.inplay.class.count}+1??
(Current turn: )>>
Shiva.baseFlair: The avatar of destruction descends in answer to your prayers, the divine spear Trishula clasped in one hand, third eye slumbering upon his brow. Behold the incarnation of immutable power, sole savior of the cosmos.
Shiva.evoFlair: When his third eye opens, it will bathe the world in purifying light. Flames will descend in defense of virtue. They are the pitiless flames of salvation, setting creation alight and returning it to nothingness.

Silent Rider.name: Silent Rider
Silent Rider.baseFlair: Jet-black thunderbolts pounded the battlefield, tearing the white-winged to pieces in an instant.
Silent Rider.evoFlair: The wings of a thousand angels were clipped, the servants of the heavens were torn to shreds, and yet the demon general only bellowed, his rage unsated.

Scorpion of Greed.name: Scorpion of Greed
Scorpion of Greed.baseFlair:
The fourth circle: Greed.
The corrupted and avaricious will go mad from the sway of the disparaging sea.
Scorpion of Greed.evoFlair:
The ninth circle: Cocytus.
Our emperor, the usurper, is enthroned where all punishment originates. Where all sin expires.

Demon of Purgatory.name: Demon of Purgatory
Demon of Purgatory.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give the enemy leader the following effect - At the start of your next turn, discard a random card from your hand.
Demon of Purgatory.baseFlair:
The first circle: Limbo.
Their prayers echoing across vast nothingness, all that stretches before those that cling to hope is hollow eternity,
Demon of Purgatory.evoFlair:
The ninth circle: Cocytus.
Our emperor, born of flame, is enthroned where all punishment originates. Where all sin expires.

Spellbook Decryption.name: Spellbook Decryption
Spellbook Decryption.baseFlair: Sure there's a shortcut to learning the magical arts! Read tons of spell books to pick up knowledge!

We've Got a Case!.name: We've Got a Case!
We've Got a Case!.baseEffect: Draw 3 cards. Then deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of cards in your hand.
We've Got a Case!.baseFlair: Criminals use implements of violence to pierce the hearts of their victims. Detectives use implements of logic to pierce the heart of the truth.

Titanic Showdown.name: Titanic Showdown
Titanic Showdown.baseEffect:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Put a random follower that originally costs at least 9 play points from your deck into your hand. If any other allied Titanic Showdowns are in play, recover 4 play points and banish this amulet.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, put 5 random followers that originally cost at least 9 play points from your hand into play.
Titanic Showdown.baseFlair: Course a grudge match between titans is a disaster waiting to happen. But for the bookmakers and street vendors, it's an opportunity waiting to happen.

Mythcleaver.name: Mythcleaver
Mythcleaver.baseEffect:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Banish an enemy amulet.
At the end of your turn, banish a random enemy follower.
Mythcleaver.baseFlair: "None of it was me," the hero grimaced. "This sword, it's the one responsible for everything." After all, a god's blade fells only a god's enemies. It pays no heed to the will of its human wielder.

Imperial Mammoth.name: Imperial Mammoth
Imperial Mammoth.baseFlair: When the great beast took its first step, a hundred soldiers were dispersed like leaves in the wind.
Imperial Mammoth.evoFlair: When the great beast took its second step, a thousand soldiers were scattered like startled birds.

Gigas.name: Gigas
Gigas.baseEffect: Clash: Until the end of the opponent's turn, this follower can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
Gigas.evoEffect: Clash: Until the end of the opponent's turn, this follower can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
Gigas.baseFlair:
Killin' a giant takes
a hundred swords,
ten hundred arrows,
and ten thousand lives.
—Terrifying Giants, folk song
Gigas.evoFlair:
But killin' a giant takes
guts, glory,
and gettin' ready to die.
—Terrifying Giants, folk song

Armored Troll.name: Armored Troll
Armored Troll.baseEffect:
Can only attack the enemy leader.
Ignore Ward.
Armored Troll.baseFlair: A martial artist knows to target the joints in the armor to shatter it. A monster merely tramples it underfoot, without even realizing it was steel.
Armored Troll.evoFlair: The martial artist's path leads to knowledge: knowledge of the body, its workings, and its weaknesses. But wisdom is a fragile, flighty thing, liable to desert us in moments of mortal peril.

Reina, Evolution's Herald.name: Reina, Evolution's Herald
Reina, Evolution's Herald.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give another unevolved allied follower the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Reina, Evolution's Herald.baseFlair: My name's Reina. Another Reina. I'm not quite the Reina you know... but I'm here to help you out!
Reina, Evolution's Herald.evoFlair: Really, we never should have met. That's why we'll have to part someday. It's a lonely thought... but I'm not scared. You're on an amazing journey and I'm excited for you!

Arriet, Soothing Harpist.name: Arriet, Soothing Harpist
Arriet, Soothing Harpist.baseEffect: Fanfare: Select an allied follower that has attacked this turn and is no longer able to attack. Fully restore its defense and the ability to attack.
Arriet, Soothing Harpist.baseFlair: With this harp granted to me by the gods, I'll play a song of blessings. I'm sure my heartwarming melodies will bring peace to you as well.
Arriet, Soothing Harpist.evoFlair: As the chosen harpist of the gods, I'll bring the melodies of paradise to those who suffer. Though the notes are still but a whisper, I believe they'll reach every corner of this world in time.

Steelclad Minotaur.name: Steelclad Minotaur
Steelclad Minotaur.baseEffect:
Accelerate (4): Summon 2 Minotaurs.
----------
Ward.
Whenever this follower is attacked, gain +0/+2.
Steelclad Minotaur.evoEffect:
Ward.
Whenever this follower is attacked, gain +0/+2.
Steelclad Minotaur.baseFlair:
Minotaur Captain: When this battle is over, I'm gonna get married.
Minotaur Soldier: I'll bring the Captain back safe and sound, no matter what it takes!
Steelclad Minotaur.evoFlair:
Minotaur Captain: I'm gonna be a father soon.
Minotaur Soldier 1: Everybody, cover the Captain!
Minotaur Soldier 2: Let's get him back home to his kid!

Boom Devil.name: Boom Devil
Boom Devil.baseEffect: Fanfare: Deal 5 damage to the enemy leader. If this is your tenth turn or later, deal 5 damage to all enemies instead.
Boom Devil.baseFlair:
Add a little gas and the spark becomes flame. So what happens when you punch up the flame?
—Cheeky Demon's Inquiry
Boom Devil.evoFlair:
Agitate the fire enough and you've got a hefty boom on your hands. So what happens when you punch up that boom?
—Cheeky Demon's Inquiry

Gabriel.name: Gabriel
Gabriel.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give +4/+3 to an allied follower.
Gabriel.baseFlair: One of the four mighty archangels who serve as divine messengers. Gabriel's benevolent smile will lead humanity to ever greater heights.
Gabriel.evoFlair: The archangel Gabriel's soul is as pure and white as her wings. As a divine representative, she presents the chosen one with new power in the form of a legendary sword.

Sahaquiel.name: Sahaquiel
Sahaquiel.baseEffect: Fanfare: Put a Neutral follower from your hand into play. Give it Rush, and return it to your hand at the end of your turn.
Sahaquiel.baseFlair: The delicate angel reigns over the sky. Though she may look innocent, her unholy rivals quiver when she launches a flurry of light-beam arrows from her star staff.
Sahaquiel.evoFlair: “Attack,” whispers the pure angel. A troop of valkyries fills the sky at her command and descends to drive away the wicked.

Zodiac Demon.name: Zodiac Demon
Zodiac Demon.baseEffect: Fanfare: Put a follower that originally costs 7 play points or less from your hand into play and destroy it. Deal X damage to a random enemy follower. If no enemy followers are in play, deal X damage to the enemy leader instead. X equals the attack of that follower.
Zodiac Demon.baseFlair: Stars do more than sit in their heavenly thrones and shine. Part of our might lies in descending to the earth and rending it. You beings with bellies on the ground, I implore you to swear your allegiance to me.
Zodiac Demon.evoFlair: Stars don't always guide their observers to brilliant futures. No, death, despair, fear—these are their true predictions. You beings who pray to the heavens, offer your fear to the light.

Marduk.name: Marduk
Marduk.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effects.
-Followers can't be played.
-Whenever you play a spell, draw a card.
-Whenever you play an amulet, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
(These effects last until this follower leaves play.)
Marduk.baseFlair: Is it a god, or it is a demon? Nay, it is neither, and it cannot be compared to any other being. It is the origin, and it is the end. That which begins the world, and that which ends it.
Marduk.evoFlair: That which differs from all else in the world. That which transcends all else in the world. Great gods and dread demons bow their heads before it.

Gilnelise, Omen of Craving.name: Gilnelise, Omen of Craving
Gilnelise, Omen of Craving.baseEffect:
Ambush.
Drain.
Fanfare: Give +2/+0 to all other allied followers.
At the start of your turn, if this is your tenth turn or later, both players draw 5 cards.
Gilnelise, Omen of Craving.evoEffect:
Ambush.
Drain.
At the start of your turn, if this is your tenth turn or later, both players draw 5 cards.
Gilnelise, Omen of Craving.baseFlair: Greetings, you adorable little soul. The world just laughs so innocently—makes me want to gobble it all up. When boys finally learn the bitterness inherent in yearning, that's when they ripen into men. Oh! Shall I put the world to the same trial?
Gilnelise, Omen of Craving.evoFlair: This passion is lovely, don't you think? Hurry and swallow it, just as your yearning commands. No one will ever touch you again; that privilege will belong only to me. Oh! Shall I put the world to the same trial?

Alterplane Arbiter.name: Alterplane Arbiter
Alterplane Arbiter.baseEffect: Fanfare: Randomly put 2 different Basic cards from the enemy leader's class into your hand and subtract 3 from their costs.
Alterplane Arbiter.baseFlair:
Realign reality. Alter the axiom, and converge a realm anew.
Realize the inconceivable, and alter destiny.
For once upon a time, man could only gaze up at the earth. —Opening lines from The Almanack
Alterplane Arbiter.evoFlair:
Hell loomed above the heavens, for the heavens lay at the ends of the earth.
We trod the clouds, we floated through the sky.
That has changed everything.
—Final lines from The Almanack

Odin, Wargod Ascendant.name: Odin, Wargod Ascendant
Odin, Wargod Ascendant.baseEffect:
Storm.
Invocation: At the start of your tenth turn or later, if at least 6 allied followers have evolved this match, invoke this card.
Follower Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return. X equals this follower's attack.
Odin, Wargod Ascendant.evoEffect:
Storm.
Follower Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return. X equals this follower's attack.
Odin, Wargod Ascendant.baseFlair: Ragnarok approaches from the depths of time. The einherjar summoned by the heavenly maidens thirst for battle. The divine warlord climbs astride Sleipnir, his trusted steed, and makes for the land of destiny, the ferocious clatter of hooves echoing in his wake.
Odin, Wargod Ascendant.evoFlair: Huginn reads the thoughts of the world, while Muninn perceives the memories of the world. Within the twilight, these two great birds deliver news of an unavoidable fate. Still the divine warlord chooses to descend upon the battlefield to face his enemies.

Athena, Divine Shield.name: Athena, Divine Shield
Athena, Divine Shield.baseEffect:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give all other allies the following effect - The next time this ally takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
Athena, Divine Shield.baseFlair: Time flows onward, but battle is a constant. We meet again, dauntless warrior. Once again, I shall shield you from defeat and the suffering that besieges you!
Athena, Divine Shield.evoFlair: A goddess of battle and a goddess of the shield. Someday I'd like to test which is stronger—her protection or my barrier. —Godsworn Alexiel

Natur Al'machinus.name: Natur Al'machinus
Natur Al'machinus.baseEffect:
Fusion: Machina or Natura
----------
Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. Put X random Machina or Natura cards from your deck into your hand. If this card is fused with a Machina and Natura card, subtract 3 from their costs. X equals the number of cards fused to this card.
Natur Al'machinus.baseFlair: The world is dead and metal. Nature is lush and fertile. The soul of steel; the frame of a flower. Worlds apart, yet worlds collided. The Omnipotence forces this mergence and births inescapable battle.
Natur Al'machinus.evoFlair: The mechanical yearns for progress; the natural yearns for propagation. Confrontation is inevitable. Hostility, unavoidable. No victors will walk away from the conflict, save perhaps for the very Omnipotence who designed it.

Flame and Glass.name: Flame and Glass
Flame and Glass.baseEffect:
Storm.
Strike: Deal 7 damage to all enemies.
Flame and Glass.evoEffect:
Storm.
Strike: Deal 7 damage to all enemies.
Flame and Glass.baseFlair: We are two, and we are one. May we never be separated again. May this world—riven into gods and demons—be united again.
Flame and Glass.evoFlair: The world is full of contradictions. Destruction and rebirth. Desire and despair. Love and hate. I am a mixture of all these things, given form in the present. Now, would you like to be burned? Or frozen? Or both?

Gluttonous Behemoth.name: Gluttonous Behemoth
Gluttonous Behemoth.baseEffect: At the end of your turn, deal 7 damage to the enemy leader.
Gluttonous Behemoth.evoEffect: At the end of your turn, deal 9 damage to the enemy leader.
Gluttonous Behemoth.baseFlair:
The third circle: Gluttony.
Eat or be eaten. This is the law of Hell.
Gluttonous Behemoth.evoFlair:
The ninth circle: Cocytus.
Our emperor, the trial-bringer, is enthroned where all punishment originates. Where all sin expires.

Dis's Damnation.name: Dis's Damnation
Dis's Damnation.baseEffect: Deal 7 damage to an enemy. Restore 7 defense to your leader.
Dis's Damnation.baseFlair: My fatal blow will be the judge.

Rampaging Mammoth.name: Rampaging Mammoth
Rampaging Mammoth.evoEffect: Evolve: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this 2 times.
Rampaging Mammoth.baseFlair: "What's makin' me legs tremble?" grumbled the veteran soldier. "Well, it ain't 'cause I'm lily-livered. Just the earth rattlin', s'all."
Rampaging Mammoth.evoFlair: "No more trembling," said the knight, looking up at the mammoth. "We'll be knocked clean out of here if we stand around quakin'!"

Pureshot Angel.name: Pureshot Angel
Pureshot Angel.baseEffect:
Accelerate (2): Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower and then 3 damage to the enemy leader.
Pureshot Angel.baseFlair: Banish evil from every corner! One clean sweep of arrows will root out even the biggest, baddest evil!
Pureshot Angel.evoFlair: Just look at that piercing action, folks! One shot will banish even the most stubborn demons!

Gilgamesh.name: Gilgamesh
Gilgamesh.baseFlair: The demigod-king Gilgamesh was in some ways more powerful than the gods themselves. His strength was irresistible, and he held dominion over the entire world.
Gilgamesh.evoFlair: The demigod-king Gilgamesh was in some ways more powerful than the gods themselves. Desperate to overcome death, he descended to the underworld in search of the secret of immortality.

Archangel Reina.name: Archangel Reina
Archangel Reina.evoEffect:
Evolve: Evolve all allied followers.
Evolve effects will not activate for those followers.
Archangel Reina.baseFlair: If you seek new heights, I can help. Embrace my power, and become who you were meant to be!
Archangel Reina.evoFlair: With my power guiding you to new heights, our victory is all but assured. I know you can do it!

Earthshock Ogre.name: Earthshock Ogre
Earthshock Ogre.baseEffect: Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy.
Earthshock Ogre.evoEffect: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to an enemy.
Earthshock Ogre.baseFlair: An embodiment of total devastation. Legends warn against challenging this mighty ogre, for those who do find themselves annihilated right along with the ground they stand on.
Earthshock Ogre.evoFlair: A raging force of nature and a razor-fanged disaster. None remain who can stop this fearsome beast. When it brings down its fist, countries, continents, and even worlds perish.

Mechawing Angel.name: Mechawing Angel
Mechawing Angel.baseEffect:
Accelerate (2): Summon 2 Assembly Droids.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Summon 2 Assembly Droids.
Mechawing Angel.baseFlair:
Verifying access request... Access granted.
Confirming damage to core.
Activating warning system.
Activating standby unit.
Mechawing Angel.evoFlair:
Verifying access request... Access granted.
Confirming changes to core.
Issuing radicalized support request.
Activating reserve unit.

Lucifer.name: Lucifer
Lucifer.baseEffect: At the end of your turn, restore 4 defense to your leader.
Lucifer.evoEffect: At the end of your turn, deal 4 damage to the enemy leader.
Lucifer.baseFlair: I wish to serve God. I wish to do all in my power to bring joy and prosperity to all. Humans, gods, and demons are equal, and I will use my powers to bring light to their existence.
Lucifer.evoFlair: I have acted against God. Banishment to an endless void awaits. Ha! Haughty gods, prepare yourselves for destruction and despair. My rebellion starts now!

Odin.name: Odin
Odin.baseEffect: Fanfare: Banish an enemy follower or amulet.
Odin.baseFlair: Odin, the greatest of the gods, presided over matters of battle. From his lofty palace in Asgard, he sought to conquer the world.
Odin.evoFlair: As the twilight begins to fall for the gods, their one-eyed father fought in the battle at Vigrid, clad in jet black armor and armed with a peerless spear.

Loki.name: Loki
Loki.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - The next time you play an allied follower with Fanfare effects (excluding targeted effects), repeat those effects. (This effect is not stackable.)
Loki.baseFlair: He is the trickster, mayhem incarnate. A shrewd, bizarre, and yet indispensable impostor. He vows to the quiet twilight, laughing at his confinement. —Twilight's Child, preface
Loki.evoFlair: An eternity spent idle; demise, a mere game. Kill a god? A poem on his lips. Revenge? A performance. With deliverance and disfigurement, now the twilight begins. —Twilight's Child, final chapter

Chronos.name: Chronos
Chronos.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give both leaders the following effect - At the end of your turn, draw cards equal to the attack of the strongest allied follower in play. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Chronos.baseFlair: A divine will, penetrating the spiral of time—his celestial inscription is universal and eternal. The sun sets, and rises to the dawn of a new life, and a new age.
Chronos.evoFlair: Time begets destruction and rebirth. Eternal peace is but a memory lost within the flow of its eternal passage. Pursue not what has been lost in its ravages, but embrace the current.

Technolord.name: Technolord
Technolord.baseEffect:
Accelerate (3): Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this X times. X equals the number of allied Machina followers destroyed this match.
----------
Fanfare: Randomly summon a copy of 1 of the highest-cost allied Machina followers (excluding Technolord) that have been destroyed this match.
Technolord.baseFlair:
Verifying access request... Access denied.
Please input the core code.
Verifying the eight core sequences...
Extracting Code: Origin.
Technolord.evoFlair:
Are you sure you want to suspend Project: Core? Y/N
Verifying the eight core sequences...
ERROR. E■ROR. ER■■R. ■■■.
Restarting. Unauthorized access detected. Commencing elimination.

Olivia, Blackened Wing.name: Olivia, Blackened Wing
Olivia, Blackened Wing.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Recover X play points. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved this match.
Once on each of your turns, when you play another follower, give it the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Olivia, Blackened Wing.evoEffect: Once on each of your turns, when you play another follower, give it the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Olivia, Blackened Wing.baseFlair: A fate determined by the gods—no different than the sealing of hope. No time to wait, only to push forward. Gods above, you may think my ambition to be nothing short of senseless. But I won't stop. Not until the very end, not until my final moment!
Olivia, Blackened Wing.evoFlair: Locked away beyond the gate, hope awaits us. Until we reach the new world, my wings will never stop. Those who seek to hinder my ambition, prepare yourselves. This magic blade rends all creation!

Heretical Hellbeast.name: Heretical Hellbeast
Heretical Hellbeast.baseEffect:
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal X damage to your leader. X equals the number of other followers in play. Then destroy all other followers.
Heretical Hellbeast.baseFlair:
The sixth circle: Heresy.
Those that have traversed the righteous order of the world will be burnt to ash.
Heretical Hellbeast.evoFlair:
The ninth circle: Cocytus.
Our emperor, the beguiler, is enthroned where all punishment originates. Where all sin expires.

Human! Pyramid! Attack!.name: Human! Pyramid! Attack!
Human! Pyramid! Attack!.baseEffect:
Rush.
Ward.
Strike: Randomly activate 1 of the following effects.
-Give +1/+0 to all allied followers.
-Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Human! Pyramid! Attack!.baseFlair:
"Brofams! Time to let 'er rip!"
"This formation is undefeated back home!"
"Dudes, let's get on it! Three, two, one..."
"Yaaahooo!"

Dark Angel Olivia.name: Dark Angel Olivia
Dark Angel Olivia.baseEffect: Fanfare: Increase your evolution points to 3.
Dark Angel Olivia.baseFlair: I welcome you, my new brethren in a world of chaos! Our clan's victories on the battlefield will surely be a blow to the gods.
Dark Angel Olivia.evoFlair: Today, my new brethren, we embark on a journey that will start with bloodshed but will one day lead us to a new world!

Israfil.name: Israfil
Israfil.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Restore 4 defense to your leader.
Strike: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.
Israfil.evoEffect: Strike: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.
Israfil.baseFlair: The task of deciding whether to pass judgment was entrusted to the most sorrowful angel of them all. To ease the suffering of those who walk the earth, she played her melodies and sang of her sorrow.
Israfil.evoFlair: She could never eliminate all the suffering no matter how hard she tried, and she finally passed her judgment in despair. Her tears fell even as she cleaved through the sinful.

Proto Bahamut.name: Proto Bahamut
Proto Bahamut.baseEffect:
Accelerate (7): Deal 3 damage to all followers. Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
----------
At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to all other followers. Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Proto Bahamut.evoEffect: At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to all other followers. Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Proto Bahamut.baseFlair: Summoned by an earnest plea, the dragon breaks its shackles. Its cry resonates across the sky and strikes awe into the hearts of all who hear it.
Proto Bahamut.evoFlair: Answering the call of the blue-haired girl, this dark dragon takes flight to confront a grave threat to all life. Unshackled at long last, its magnificent roar rattles the heavens.

Prince of Cocytus.name: Prince of Cocytus
Prince of Cocytus.baseEffect:
Accelerate (3): Randomly put 4 different Cocytus cards into your deck.
----------
Fanfare: Replace your deck with a Cocytus Deck.
Prince of Cocytus.baseFlair: The Heavens fall to Earth. Earth plunges into Hell. Cocytus swallows all, robbing Creation of breath and entombing it in ice. Conqueror. Serpent. Father of Lies. Being with faces innumerable—none of them true. The only certainty is this: He is the world's adversary.
Prince of Cocytus.evoFlair: Part your lips to speak: Ice will take your throat, twine through your entrails. Be silent: Ice will seal your lips eternally. Blades shall rust away. Knowledge burn to cinders. Life shall be Cocytus's shivering prisoner. The only option is this: To cast this world aside.

Mammoth God's Colosseum.name: Mammoth God's Colosseum
Mammoth God's Colosseum.baseEffect:
Rush.
Fanfare: Destroy all other followers except a random enemy follower with the highest attack. Then, if at least 4 followers have been destroyed this turn, summon an Imperial Mammoth.
Mammoth God's Colosseum.baseFlair: Every hundred years, the towering mammoth god gathers the strongest fighters from every realm and holds a tournament. To enter, one must possess the eight essential wills. Competitors flock to the colosseum, each for their own reason.
Mammoth God's Colosseum.evoFlair: Every hundred years, the mammoth god's trumpeting opens wide the gates to other worlds. Victors shall rule. Losers shall serve. The clash of desires in the colosseum shall be offered up to the god.

Prince of Darkness.name: Prince of Darkness
Prince of Darkness.baseEffect: Fanfare: Replace your deck with an Apocalypse Deck.
Prince of Darkness.baseFlair: The would-be usurper of Heaven, cast into the pits of Hell, has risen again in a cloak of flame. Soon this underworld king shall spark an apocalypse that paints all mortals and gods in blood.
Prince of Darkness.evoFlair: The king of the underworld and his gathered armies of darkness reveled in the coming of the day of revelation. Chaos and destruction tore through the world in a dance of madness, staining all in despair.

Bahamut.name: Bahamut
Bahamut.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Destroy all other followers.
Can't attack the enemy leader if 2 or more enemy followers are in play.
Bahamut.evoEffect: Can't attack the enemy leader if 2 or more enemy followers are in play.
Bahamut.baseFlair: The supreme dragon, standing with the gods themselves. The beauty of its deep black frame overwhelms all else in creation.
Bahamut.evoFlair: The supreme dragon, standing with the gods themselves. Unsurpassed are its divine powers, and heroes dream often of its glory.

Zeus.name: Zeus
Zeus.baseFlair: The omnipotent being who in time reigned supreme over the other gods. He was born to a goddess and rebelled against his divine father.
Zeus.evoFlair: Clad in the armor of fear and wielding a radiant lightning spear, the almighty sky father illuminated the sky of dawn.

Queen of the Dread Sea.name: Queen of the Dread Sea
Queen of the Dread Sea.baseEffect: Fanfare: Subtract 20 from the cost of a Neutral card (excluding Queen of the Dread Sea) and a non-Neutral card in your hand. Then discard all other cards in your hand.
Queen of the Dread Sea.baseFlair: Prostrate yourself, and vow your loyalty to me. You'll no longer thirst for what you wish for. Tell me your wishes, and then drink down mine.
Queen of the Dread Sea.evoFlair: Where go your wishes? Your fragile dreams? Do they sink like a stone into the abyss, or do they rise like bubbles to the surface? Your actions determine all.

Zeus, the Supreme.name: Zeus, the Supreme
Zeus, the Supreme.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Randomly activate 1 of the following effects. Do this X times. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved this match.
-Restore 5 defense to your leader.
-Gain +3/+0 and the ability to ignore Ward.
-Gain +2/+1 and Storm.
-Gain +1/+2 and Bane.
-Gain +0/+3 and Ward.
Zeus, the Supreme.baseFlair: A blade of lightning rests in his grip. The same flash that would make the night sky tremble—it punishes the darkness and descends upon the land. When the threads of fate entwine at last, the final battle against the lord of purgatory shall begin.
Zeus, the Supreme.evoFlair: The adamantine scythe destroys all that it touches; the aegis shield defends all from destruction. When the gods supreme take to arms, the world trembles.

Astaroth's Reckoning.name: Astaroth's Reckoning
Astaroth's Reckoning.baseEffect: Deal damage to the enemy leader until their defense drops to 1.
Astaroth's Reckoning.baseFlair: Your fate's reached the end of its thread.
